title: game freezing 2 second random while playing
body:
hey 
i have a problem with my game 
the game was fine but i was out like for 10 days and when i opened it again found while playing the game freezing like 2 second randomly i searched for a solution and check my internet and updates every thing but the problem still 
can anyone help me 
thanks

replies.body: Are you using Windows 10?  Some of this could be caused by the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) but disabling it can help.  Otherwise, let's see if this is happening as a result of FPS or something else like packet loss.  A [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) should tell us more, let me know what you find.
